subject_migrate_user.message: Set up your new Webmaker account password

new_login_system.message: Webmaker is using a new log in system to ensure your experience is simple and safe.

set_password_text.message: To get started, click here to set a password, or copy and paste the url below into your browser:
set_password_text.description: A link to follow to get started migrating

need_help.message: If you did not try to create a password, you can ignore this message, or send an email to help@webmaker.org to ask for help.
need_help.description: A message describing how to set a password or seek help
